title: Restaurant-Style Spinach Casserole
directions: In a saucepan, whisk together soup, flour, butter, garlic salt, salt and pepper. Add spinach and onion, cook over medium heat until thick and hot.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup
2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
